Uses of Interface
eu.iv4xr.framework.extensions.pathfinding.Navigatable

Packages that use Navigatable
Package
Description
eu.iv4xr.framework.extensions.pathfinding
This package provides classes to do pathfinding over a graph.
eu.iv4xr.framework.mainConcepts
 
nl.uu.cs.aplib.exampleUsages.miniDungeon.testAgent
This package contains the implementation of iv4xr Env, State, TacticLib, GoalLib etc, which are necessary to allow an aplib/iv4xr test agent to control the game in the smart way.

  • Uses of Navigatable in eu.iv4xr.framework.extensions.pathfinding

    Classes in eu.iv4xr.framework.extensions.pathfinding that implement Navigatable
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    SimpleNavGraph
    This class is provides an implementation of a navigation graph (an instance of Navigatable) that facilitates pathfinding over a 3D-surface defined by a surface-mesh with obstacles.
    class 
    Sparse2DTiledSurface_NavGraph
    Representing a navigation graph over a 2D tiled-world.
    class 
    SurfaceNavGraph
    A navigation-graph over a 3D-surface.

    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    Function<Navigatable<NodeId>,​BiFunction<NodeId,​NodeId,​Float>>
    AStar.dynamicHeuristicDistance
    When this is set, this function will be use to calculate the heuristic distance between two nodes, rather than using the default heuristic-method supplied by underlying navigation graph.
